mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student (student_id, real_name, gender, class_name, phone, email, user_id) VALUES (#{studentNumber}, #{realName}, #{gender}, #{className}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{userId})
mapper.update: UPDATE student SET student_id = #{studentNumber}, real_name = #{realName}, gender = #{gender}, class_name = #{className}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.student_id, s.real_name, s.gender, s.class_name, s.phone, s.email, s.user_id FROM student s WHERE s.student_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR s.real_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
